thread.title: Smorgasburg Goes Westward to Santa Monica for One Day Pop-Up
thread.title_full: Smorgasburg Goes Westward to Santa Monica for One Day Pop-Up

author: Matthew Kang
title: Smorgasburg Goes Westward to Santa Monica for One Day Pop-Up
text:
The weekly food fest lands right on the Santa Monica Pier
Smorgasburg, the Sunday food bonanza with some of the best fare available in town on a single day of the week , is heading west to Santa Monica Pier for a one day pop-up on Saturday, March 11. With the usual lineup of heavy-hitting favorites like Shrimp Daddy, Amazebowls, Cheezus, and Goa Taco, the seaside version adds a few new vendors, like a Japanese dessert shop and a chai brewer. 
In addition to the slate of food offerings, there will be a significant shopping component, for those looking to grab some mementos and crafted goods. If you’ve been hesitant to venture to Downtown on a Sunday and see what the hubbub’s been all about, this is a great chance to try some of the exact same Instagram-worthy food on the Westside.
The one day event commences at 11 a.m. and runs to 5 p.m. with free admission and plenty of parking available nearby in lots or at the beach. Smorgasburg’s normal Sunday schedule will resume on March 12 at ROW DTLA.
Why Smorgasburg Delivers on Its Big, Beautiful Promise [ELA] All Smorgasburg LA Coverage [ELA]
